Hakyll Reviwed

During easter I finally found some time to improve upon my website. Fix the styling, the html templates, and the rest. But during this “involuntary” break of little more over a year I found myself scratching me head looking through my jekyll project. Oh my… I thought. And promptly decided to rebuild the entire thing using hakyll instead. Brilliant, wouldn’t you agree?
